DOC.brief_summary: Patients higher breast cancer risk ( high 17 % accord IBIS calculation ) receive 2D digital mammography together 3D tomosynthesis ( call combo tomo ) breast two view order investigate additional value tomosynthesis diagnosis breast cancer .
